rrr
  • Reference
  • Articles
  • News

Fit Reduced-Rank Regression Model

rrr fits a reduced-rank regression model.

rrr(x, y, type = "identity", rank = "full", k = 0)

Arguments

x
data frame or matrix of predictor variables
y
data frame or matrix of response variables
type
type of reduced-rank regression model to fit. type = "identity", the default, uses \(\mathbf{\Gamma} = \mathbf{I}\) to fit a reduced-rank regression. type = "pca" fits a principal component analysis model as a special case of reduced-rank regression. type = "cva" fits a canonical variate analysis model as a special case of reduced-rank regression. type = "lda" fits a linear discriminant analysis model as a special case of reduced-rank regression.
rank
rank of coefficient matrix.
k
small constant added to diagonal of covariance matrices to make inversion easier.

Value

list containing estimates of coefficients and means, and eigenvalue-based diagnostics.

References

Izenman, A.J. (2008) Modern Multivariate Statistical Techniques. Springer.

Examples

data(tobacco)
tobacco_x <- tobacco[,4:9]
tobacco_y <- tobacco[,1:3]
rrr(tobacco_x, tobacco_y, rank = 1)
#> $mean
#>                         [,1]
#> Y1.BurnRate         1.749756
#> Y2.PercentSugar    14.687990
#> Y3.PercentNicotine  2.639914
#> 
#> $A
#>                           [,1]
#> Y1.BurnRate         0.03107787
#> Y2.PercentSugar    -0.97005030
#> Y3.PercentNicotine  0.24090782
#> 
#> $B
#>      X1.PercentNitrogen X2.PercentChlorine X3.PercentPotassium
#> [1,]            4.32427          -1.358648           -1.480832
#>      X4.PercentPhosphorus X5.PercentCalcium X6.PercentMagnesium
#> [1,]            -13.72942        -0.4528289            3.866896
#> 
#> $C
#>                    X1.PercentNitrogen X2.PercentChlorine X3.PercentPotassium
#> Y1.BurnRate                 0.1343891        -0.04222389         -0.04602109
#> Y2.PercentSugar            -4.1947590         1.31795724          1.43648115
#> Y3.PercentNicotine          1.0417504        -0.32730901         -0.35674392
#>                    X4.PercentPhosphorus X5.PercentCalcium X6.PercentMagnesium
#> Y1.BurnRate                  -0.4266812       -0.01407296           0.1201749
#> Y2.PercentSugar              13.3182319        0.43926680          -3.7510833
#> Y3.PercentNicotine           -3.3075256       -0.10909002           0.9315654
#> 
#> $eigenvalues
#> [1] 3.28209974 0.03782978 0.01015996
#> 

data(pendigits)
digits_features <- pendigits[, -35:-36]
rrr(digits_features, digits_features, type = "pca", rank = 3)
#> $means
#>        V1        V2        V3        V4        V5        V6        V7        V8 
#> 38.814320 85.120269 40.605622 83.774199 49.770378 65.573144 51.220251 44.498999 
#>        V9       V10       V11       V12       V13       V14       V15       V16 
#> 56.868541 33.695961 60.516376 34.826510 55.022289 34.937045 47.287482 28.845342 
#>       V17       V18       V19       V20       V21       V22       V23       V24 
#>  4.431587  5.341794 38.814320 85.120269 40.605622 83.774199 49.770378 65.573144 
#>       V25       V26       V27       V28       V29       V30       V31       V32 
#> 51.220251 44.498999 56.868541 33.695961 60.516376 34.826510 55.022289 34.937045 
#>       V33       V34

#>

library(dplyr)
data(COMBO17)
galaxy <- as_data_frame(COMBO17)
galaxy <- select(galaxy, -starts_with("e."), -Nr, -UFS:-IFD)
galaxy <- na.omit(galaxy)
galaxy_x <- select(galaxy, -Rmag:-chi2red)
galaxy_y <- select(galaxy, Rmag:chi2red)
rrr(galaxy_x, galaxy_y, type = "cva", rank = 2)
#> $mean
#>               [,1]
#> Rmag    27.0430945
#> ApDRmag  0.9028657
#> mumax   25.6729200
#> Mcz     -1.3514412
#> MCzml   -1.2214416
#> chi2red  2.1352826
#> 
#> $G
#>           UjMAG        BjMAG     VjMAG       usMAG      gsMAG      rsMAG
#> [1,] -0.4026736 -0.002648682 -1.063946 -0.03793168  0.1435434  0.7446434
#> [2,] -1.8871230 -0.021421754  3.036531 -1.92938162 -0.8238762 -2.4591042
#>           UbMAG       BbMAG       VnMAG      S280MAG    W420FE    W462FE
#> [1,] 0.03191507  0.13435547 -0.01074357 -0.005520653  1.808397  2.594173
#> [2,] 4.20231673 -0.02961893  0.06238929 -0.031742088 32.171809 12.197256
#>         W485FD     W518FE    W571FS    W604FE    W646FD    W696FE     W753FE

#> [2,] -4.094297 -18.010147 -16.43018 -2.484012  6.844791 15.661076 -11.090582

#> [2,] 14.5603371 3.6135546 -6.306661 -2.3404624
#> 
#> $H
#>            Rmag    ApDRmag      mumax        Mcz      MCzml    chi2red
#> [1,] -0.5657905 -0.4822494  0.1134821  1.4069068  1.3645567 -0.6210710
#> [2,] -0.2869686  0.1150591 -0.4323321 -0.5932063 -0.5813512  0.2503455

#> [1] 0.94263015 0.57868061 0.08584486 0.04088308 0.03102955 0.02483753
#> 

data(iris)
iris_x <- iris[,1:4]
iris_y <- iris[5]
rrr(iris_x, iris_y, type = "lda")
#> $G
#> # A tibble: 4 × 2
#>          LD1         LD2
#>        <dbl>       <dbl>
#> 1 -0.1427341  0.01008498
#> 2 -0.2640795  0.90569343
#> 3  0.3788238 -0.38994070
#> 4  0.4836742  1.18799194
#> 
#> $H
#> # A tibble: 2 × 2
#>          LD1        LD2
#>        <dbl>      <dbl>
#> 1 -1.1238094 -0.3321454
#> 2 -0.2653032 -1.1058991
#>
